newsitem.title: USA: Avant extends pact with Lucent.
newsitem.headline: Avant extends pact with Lucent.

text.p: Avant! Corp said Friday it has signed a long-term extension of its contract with Lucent Technologies Inc's Microelectronics Group.
The deal extends a contract from December, 1994, for the supply of integrated circuit design automation (ICDA) tools for System-ASIC (application-specific standard products) designs.
Terms of the multi-year agreement were not disclosed.
"Lucent's order confirms Avant!'s market momentum," Chairman, President and Chief Executive Gerald Hsu said in a statement.
"It is a major order for us. We're very pleased that Lucent -- the industry's largest standard cell ASIC supplier -- continues to incorporate Avant!'s tool suite into their design flows," he said.

The extension provides for a substantial expansion of Lucent's usage of Aquarius-BV and Aquarius-XO place-and-route, Planet timing-driven floorplanning, Hercules hierarchical physical design verification, and other Avant! integrated circuit design automation tools.
Shares of Avant closed 3-7/8 higher at 25 on Nasdaq.
